Review_title: This movie has more layers than most.
Review_Text: Miguel is a very complex, very real character and his story is very compelling. The fact that this is a documentary, makes his rawness, vulnerability, and bravery; awe inspiring.Raheb, with good instinct and pure talent weaves together Miguel's fractured past; like a master therapist doing trauma work with their client. However, in the process of recording the process, also becomes an important character in the film.This film can be used to teach therapy. This film is really a masterpiece and can be a template of how individual (true) stories can be told in a compelling and psychologically rich way.
